data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in A Coruña, Galicia, Spain a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of A Coruña, Galicia, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in A Coruña, Galicia, Spain to the gospel today.
Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of A Coruña.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in A Coruña, Galicia, Spain to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Santiago de Compostela
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Santiago de Compostela, Galicia, Spain.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of A Coruña
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of A Coruña. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.section_summary:
the county of A Coruña, Galicia, Spain has a population of 1,145,500.

We estimate A Coruña has 18,342 people who might know Jesus, 867,240 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 259,918 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in A Coruña who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
